page.title: 20CREDITS & REFERENCES
page.content:
{ST.JOSEPH'S RC SCHOOL: {Matthew Bradbury,Brendan {Cronin,Deborah Curry,Lionel {D'Rozario,Pamela Furniss, Lindsey {Kay,Elizabeth Muldowney,Nicholas {O'Mahony,Jerry O'Mahony,Glenn {Priestley,Amanda Somerfield,Matthew {Stones. }
{ASHGROVE FIRST SCHOOL: Michael {Morgan (Headteacher),Dorothy {Short(Teacher),Mandy Wilson, Michaelle {Chafer,Lea Hardy, Peter Warburton, {Cllr. Mrs. D. Kenningham JP,MBE,Helen {Hicken, David Fletcher. { {We extend our grateful thanks to the {peoples of South Elmsall,South Kirkby {& Moorthorpe and Upton, without whose {co-operation this Domesday Survey {would not have been possible. }
